channel.title: Teleporting problems

item.title: Teleporting problems
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

It’s not that hard, all you have to do is look up everything in client.java related to teleportation spells in a different source and add them in, at the correct place ofcourse. I’m just saying, I think theres more stuff you need to add in. Just from looking at what you’ve added so far I knew straight away.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting problems
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Hmm, well I am using I loot I’s satan’s isle source. As you may know, he deleted teleporting. I’m trying to re add it in, but it’s not working. I’ve added this already:

[code] if (s == “Varrock”)
{
teleX = 2737;
teleY = 3472;
addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {
    teleX = 2725;
    teleY = 3493;
    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
         
 }

 if (s == "Lumby")
 {
    teleX = 3222;
    teleY = 3218;
    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {
    teleX = 2757;
    teleY = 3477;
   addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

    teleY = 3305;
    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;

 if (s == "Trollheim")

    newheightLevel = 0;

 {
    teleX = 2761;
    teleY = 2784;
    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 1;
 }
if (s == "Paddewwa"){

    teleX = 3131;
    teleY = 9912;
    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;

startAnimation(1979);
}
if (s == “Senntisten”){

    teleX = 3312;

    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;

startAnimation(1979);
}
if (s == “Kharyrll”){

    newheightLevel = 0;

startAnimation(1979);
}
if (s == “Lasaar”){

    newheightLevel = 0;

startAnimation(1979);
}
if (s == “Carrallangar”){

startAnimation(1979);
}
if (s == “Annakarl”){

    teleX = 3288;

    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;

startAnimation(1979);
}
if (s == “Ghorrock”){

    teleX = 3105;
    teleY = 3961;
    addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;

startAnimation(1979);
}[/code] and I KNOW it’s in the right area, What did I miss?
